alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 3:30PM EDT until August 02 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Southeastern Aroostook County in northern Maine... North central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument to 8 miles northeast of Mount Katahdin to 9 miles northwest of Millinocket, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Millinocket, Patten, East Millinocket, Medway, Sherman, Island Falls, Smyrna, Mount Chase, Sherman Station, Shin Pond, Smyrna Mills, Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Dudley Township, Reed Plantation, Baxter State Park, Oakfield, Stacyville, Merrill, Crystal and Dyer Brook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
